events.message: I purchased a jacket from your store last week, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit properly. Please let me know how to get a refund.
The case has been categorized under Refund as the customer requests returning a purchased item and receiving money back.
This case has been assigned to the refunds department to process the return request accordingly.
